### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of steam engine not found, boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0) and offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)

### Copper plate mine not found

### Copper cable factory not found

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) and pipe connections at positions [(x=-17.5, y=25.5), (x=-16.5, y=25.5), (x=-15.5, y=25.5)]

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0) and pipe connections at positions [(x=-24.5, y=30.5)]

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to each other before attempting to connect them.
- Make sure that the pipe connections are properly established between the entities.
- Verify that the fluid system is correctly set up and that the entities are part of the same fluid system.

### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure that the tile where the pipe is being placed is not occupied by another entity.
- Make sure that the pipe is being placed at a valid position, taking into account the connections and fluid systems.

### Errors when using connect_entities function
- Check that the entities being connected are valid and exist on the map.
- Verify that the prototype being used for connection (in this case, Prototype.Pipe) is correct and applicable for the entities being connected.
